strong.span: Breakfast and lunch will continue to be available, free of charge, for students in need while QUFSD schools are closed. Full information, including a Google map of community locations with the estimated times of arrival for each location, can be found here.

a.title: Go to comments for Free meals available for students during extended closing

span.strong: WSWHE BOCES is providing child care for families of essential health care workers and first responders. Learn more about obtaining child care.

a.title: Go to comments for Child Care

p.span: Free and Reduced-Price Meals: Queensbury schools offer children and staff a choice of well-balanced, nutritious meals each school day. Children who meet federal income guidelines may be eligible to receive full schools meals for free (snacks and a la carte items do not qualify under the program.) Click here to learn more and apply.

a.title: Go to comments for Free/reduced-price school meals

p.span: Dig into the Virtual Backpack - Community Events and Programs and the Virtual Backpack - Queensbury Parks and Recreation Programs to find summer activities, camps and coupons.

a.title: Go to comments for Dig into the Virtual Backpack

p.span: Spartan sports updates are available on the Athletics Department website or @QbyAthletics on Twitter.

a.title: Go to comments for Follow Spartan Sports on Athletics Website, Twitter Page

p.span: Welcome to the district virtual backpack, a place where parents and students can find flyers, documents and forms from school and community organizations, including: building flyers, student bulletins, newsletters, menus, codes of conduct, and forms for athletics, health services, technology and transportation. Click on your child's school virtual backpack below:
